TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TargetCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

type TargetCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

Docs.summary:
This class (and the whole namespace) is deprecated. Please use the classes in these namespaces instead: Microsoft.Build.ConstructionMicrosoft.Build.EvaluationMicrosoft.Build.Execution
This class represents a collection of persisted <Target>'s. Each MSBuild project has exactly one TargetCollection, which includes all the imported Targets as well as the ones in the main project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > This class (and the whole namespace) is deprecated. Please use the classes in these namespaces instead: > <xref:Microsoft.Build.Construction> > <xref:Microsoft.Build.Evaluation> > <xref:Microsoft.Build.Execution>
